articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Art Squad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Art Squad
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the art squad of KPA Large Combined Unit 324.
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers of diverse genres as dialogic poem "Great Revolutionary Routine", female solo "We Will Hold Father Kim Jong Il in Higher Esteem", female quintet "My Country of Great Changes", witty talk "Let's Remember the Days of Soldier", serial songs "At a Breath" and "Push Back Frontiers of Science," poem and story telling "Rays of Light under Socialism and Glitter of Soldier's Eyes", drum and song "Song of General Mobilization" and chorus "Let's Become Seventh Regiment of Modern Type".
					
					 Through the performance replete with the revolutionary soldier spirit, the performers vividly showed the invincible might of the heroic KPA which has grown to be a matchless army under the care of Kim Jong Il and the firm faith and will of the servicepersons to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms under the leadership of the Party.
					
					 They clearly proved the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy of conducting performing activities of anti-Japanese guerrilla style by fully displaying the enthusiasm and mettle with which they have conducted militant frontline information service and frontline agitation at every post and drill ground to arouse servicepersons to perform feats in their struggle. They, at the same time, fully demonstrated the might of artistes of the army successfully performing their militant mission as honorable sentinels standing on the first-line of the ideological front. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction over the fact that they presented a splendid performance great in its ideological value and high in artistry with numbers of great cognitional and instructive value as they truthfully represented the inexhaustible mental power and noble traits of the KPA. He extended high appreciation and thanks to them.
					
					 He appreciated the efforts made by the members of the squad, noting that they conducted militant performing activities, sharing weal and woe with soldiers as befitting artistes of the revolutionary army, thereby instilling conviction of sure victory and optimism and fighting spirit and courage to annihilate the enemy into the servicepersons all out in the general march in the new year. 
					
					 He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for all art squads to more dynamically conduct performing activities as required by the era of Songun, noting that performing activities are an effective means for educating the servicepersons.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the KPA and Kim Kyong Hui, department director of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: DPRK on Reasonable Way for Sept. 19 Joint Statement
articles.content:
DPRK on Reasonable Way for Sept. 19 Joint Statement
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty is a reasonable way for comprehensively and fully implementing the September 19 Joint Statement, declared a spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK in a statement issued Monday.
					 If the joint statement is to be implemented, the spirit of mutual respect and equality, which keeps the statement vital, should not be violated and there should not be such practice as distorting the order of action, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The joint statement calls for "harmoniously" settling the issues of denuclearization, normalization of relations, energy compensation and the establishment of a peace-keeping regime. There is no agreed point that the issue of establishing a peace-keeping regime can be discussed only when denuclearization makes progress. Only the principle of "commitment for commitment" and "action for action" is laid down as the only principle for implementing the joint statement.
					
					 Taking the situation of the U.S. side into consideration, the DPRK made such magnanimous efforts as keeping the discussion of denuclearization ahead of the debate on the issue of concluding a peace treaty at the six-party talks for more than six years. In 2008 the international community witnessed the blowing up of the cooling tower of the nuclear facility in Nyongbyon. The process of denuclearization made such substantial progress that the U.S. stopped applying the Trading with the Enemy Act and de-listed the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism".
					
					 This notwithstanding, the debate on the conclusion of a peace treaty failed to kick off, consequently pushing back the process of denuclearization. The mode of pushing ahead with denuclearization before discussing the peace-keeping regime ended in failure. The practical experience proved that pushing forward denuclearization in the absence of confidence is just like building a house without a foundation.
					
					 The DPRK is not opposed to the six-party talks and has no ground whatsoever to delay them.
					
					 There happened such a thing as taking issue even with the satellite launch for peaceful purposes as there was no confidence among the parties to the talks. A satellite launch has never been considered as problematic among the countries that trust one another. Such extreme encroachment upon the sovereignty of a country as discriminately taking issue with its satellite launch compelled it to take such self-defensive counter-measure as a nuclear test and the resultant sanctions caused such a vicious cycle of distrust as bringing the six-party talks to a collapse. 
					
					  It is the purport of the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty to put an end to such vicious cycle of distrust and build confidence to push forward denuclearization. There will be a starting point of confidence building only if the parties concerned sit at a negotiating table for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 If the six-party talks are to take place again, it is necessary to seek whatever way of removing the factor of torpedoing them. The latest sanctions are not particularly new for the DPRK as it has got used to blockade and sanctions for decades. But if the DPRK goes out for the six-party talks, remaining subjected to the sanctions, such talks will not prove to be equal talks as clarified in the Sept. 19 Joint Statement but the talks between "defendant" and "judge". The dignity of the DPRK will never allow this to happen. It is nonsensical for the DPRK to sit at the negotiating table with those countries that violate its sovereignty, allowing it to be persistently encroached  upon, and discuss with them the deterrent it built to defend its sovereignty.
					
					 The DPRK will continue to make sincere efforts to persuade the parties concerned into accepting its realistic proposal based on experience and lesson.

articles.title: New Documentary Film Produced
articles.content:
New Documentary Film Produced
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Documentary film "Along Mountaineering Routes of Loving Care for the People" was produced by the Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio.
					The film shows scenes introducing the mountaineering routes newly paved in Mt. Myohyang and other places of the mountain which turned into a better pleasure ground thanks to the warm loving care and wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It deals with the immortal exploits of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu who worked heart and soul to make the beautiful mountain people's own.
					
					 It edits scenes showing the strenuous efforts made by party members and other working people in North Phyongan Province including the members of the youth shock brigade who paved the routes including the paths to Isonnam Falls and Manphok Ravine and built resting places in various spots while preserving the renewed landscape and natural beauty of Mt. Myohyang.
					
					 The film also shows the great benevolence shown by Kim Jong Il for those who built another edifice in the era of Songun in a short period.

articles.title: Air-Conditioner for Bioclean Room Developed
articles.content:
Air-Conditioner for Bioclean Room Developed
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Korean scientists have recently developed an air-conditioner for bioclean room.
					 The high-tech device removes such pollutional and harmful matters as dust, germ and virus from inside room.
					
					 Its sterilizing rate is more than 95 percent and absorbing rate of dust particles not smaller than 0.5 micrometer is 90 percent or higher. It also generates a large amount of anion.
					
					 The air-conditioner is suitable for rooms which need to be kept germ-free and dust-free.
					
					 In particular, the device makes it possible for hospitals to keep their operating rooms germ-free on a very high level and remarkably shorten the period of postoperative treatment while using less or no antibiotic medicines.
					
					 Pyongyang Municipal People's Hospital No. 2, Pyongyang University of Medicine Teaching Hospital and many other medical institutions have already benefited from it.

articles.title: Light Industry Factories Operated to Boost  Goods Output
articles.content:
Light Industry Factories Operated to Boost Goods Output
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The joint New Year editorial published by leading newspapers of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea calls for launching an all-Party, nationwide effort to improve the people's living standard considerably this year that marks the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 In response to the call, light industry factories throughout the country have sharply increased production with plans worked out in a concrete form from the beginning of the year.
					
					 Deeply aware that light industry is a major front for the improvement of the people's living, their officials have actively organized and directed the production activities, giving precedence to the supply of raw materials to keep production on a high level.
					
					In particular, the Pyongyang Textile Mill, the Huichon Silk Mill, the Taedonggang Foodstuff Factory and the Hoeryong Essential Foodstuff Factory, given field guidance by General Secretary Kim Jong Il last year, have taken effective measures to mass-produce quality consumer goods and materials.
					
					 The workers and technicians of the factories, conscious that the variety and quality of goods should be augmented  for the betterment of the people's living, have strictly observed technical rules and standard regulations, fully displaying the collectivist spirit of helping and leading each other forward.
					
					 In the flames of the effort for building a thriving nation, the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory, the Pyongyang Leather Shoes Factory and the Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory have concentrated on radically raising the quality of goods to suit the developing tendency of the time and the growing demands of the consumers.
					
					 Goods mass-produced by light industry factories across the country are popular among the people.

articles.title: Improved Inter-Korean Relations Called for
articles.content:
Improved Inter-Korean Relations  Called for
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The inter-Korean relations still remain deteriorated despite the positive efforts made by the DPRK to achieve national reconciliation and unity and the country's reunification last year, guided by the spirit of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. This is attributable to the south Korean authorities' persistent anti-reunification moves to escalate confrontation with compatriots.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities pretend to be interested in improving the inter-Korean relations. But, they have, in actuality, kicked up the racket for confrontation with fellow countrymen more frantically than ever before in collusion with outside forces, displeased with any process for doing so. 
					
					 Without any will to warm the ties between the north and the south it is impossible to find a solution to any problem, in the final analysis.
					
					There were neither proper dialogue nor cooperation and exchange between the north and the south last year mainly because of the lack of the above-said will on the part of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 What is intolerable is that the south Korean ruling forces rejected the involvement of non-governmental bodies and figures and incriminated any contact and exchange of organizations of various circles with the north, making a monopoly of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 If NGOs come out to settle the inter-Korean relations, it is possible to settle various complicated issues indirectly.
					
					 The abnormal inter-Korean relations should be settled without delay as they run counter to the need of the era.
					
					 To this end the south Korean authorities should not hesitate to opt for improving the inter-Korean relations from a proper approach and stand on them. Their prospect entirely depends on the attitude of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: Struggle against Anti-Socialist Moves Called for
articles.content:
Struggle against Anti-Socialist Moves Called for
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- In order to defend and successfully advance socialism it is necessary to wage an uncompromising struggle against the anti-socialist moves. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday urges this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The reality of the countries where socialism collapsed and capitalism was revived teaches the truth that one should mercilessly fight the enemies of socialism and the class enemies without the slightest compromise and a bitter lesson that giving up socialism leads to death whereas defending it leads to victory. 
					
					 Imperialists run the whole gamut of vicious moves like despicable plots and mud-slinging, appeasement, deception, threat and blackmail and pressure after singling out the socialist countries and other countries aspiring after socialism as main targets of their attack. 
					
					 This is evidenced by the imperialists' desperate moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK, Cuba, etc. Therefore, a resolute uncompromising struggle should be waged against the imperialists to defend socialism.
					
					 It is also important to struggle against allies and stooges of the imperialists.
					
					 A fierce struggle should be waged against the class enemies within the socialist society. 
					
					 All those who try to destabilize the socialist society are the enemies of socialism. They include remnants of the exploiting classes who harbor antipathy towards the socialist system, those who work hard overtly and covertly to bring down the socialist system after being greased by imperialists, those who have degenerated ideologically and morally, taken in by the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning and those who are introducing corrupt bourgeois way of life into society. Only when a fierce struggle is waged against them is it possible to protect and reinforce the position of socialism. 
					
					 The peoples of all the progressive countries of the world aspiring after socialism are called upon to wage a staunch struggle to foil the vicious anti-socialist moves of the enemies of socialism and achieve progress and victory of the popular masses' cause of independence, the cause of socialism.

articles.title: Durable Peace in Korea Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Durable Peace in Korea Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea and other organizations for peace and reunification movement against war staged an "action for independent reunification and peace" outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on January 12. 
					 The organizations declared that they would rename the anti-U.S. solidarity meeting which had been held so far outside the U.S. embassy every month, the latest being the 123rd meeting, an "action for independent reunification and peace" and carry it on this year.
					
					 They in a written protest to the U.S. embassy demanded the U.S. positively respond to the proposal of the DPRK for an early start of the talks for replacing the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty.
					
					 Terming the above-said proposal a very just one for peace, security and denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, they urged the U.S. to come out for the talks for concluding the peace treaty without delay.
					
					 Noting that the conclusion of the treaty is a matter the solution of which brooks no further delay, they urged the U.S. to immediately lift sanctions against the DPRK and strive to build a lasting peace-keeping regime on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Headquarters of the Movement for the Withdrawal of the U.S. Forces in south Korea issued a statement on January 11 in support of the DPRK proposal for concluding a peace treaty. If the U.S. truly wishes for peace and denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, it should respond to the above-said proposal at once, it urged.

articles.title: Indonesian Figure to Boost Relations with WPK
articles.content:
Indonesian Figure to Boost Relations with WPK
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Megawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, met with the DPRK ambassador to Indonesia on January 13.
					She hoped that the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the government and people of the DPRK would achieve greater successes in the drive for building an economic power and reunifying the country in response to the joint New Year editorial under the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 She expressed her affirmation for the joint New Year editorial of the leading papers of the DPRK which declared the will to strive for opening the way for improvement of inter-Korean relations, establishing durable peace mechanism on the Korean Peninsula and realizing its denuclearization this year which marks the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. She sincerely hoped that Korea would be reunified as early as possible.
					
					 She stressed that her party would always support the efforts of the party, government and people of the DPRK for the country's reunification and peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula and actively try to continue to boost the friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK FM Statement Supported
articles.content:
DPRK FM Statement Supported
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Mexican political parties and organizations including the People's Socialist Party and the Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism released a joint statement on January 13 in support of the statement of the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The statement said that the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is the goal of the policy consistently pursued by the government of the DPRK with a view to contributing to peace and security in Northeast Asia and making the world nuclear-free.
					
					 It warmly hailed as initiative, constructive and important measure the proposal for an early start of the talks for replacing the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty this year which marks the lapse of 60 years since the outbreak of the Korean War courteously raised by the DPRK to the parties to AA and fully supported it. 
					
					 It called on political parties, governments and organizations of all countries in the world to dynamically support the Workers' Party of Korea, the government and people of the DPRK in their struggle to glorify the year 2010 as a year in which the Koreans open a new phase of independent reunification by stepping up the nationwide grand march toward reunification holding the slogan "Let the entire nation unite under the banner of north-south joint declarations and achieve national reunification at the earliest date!" this year that marks the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea, the 10th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for the founding of the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee, too, issued a statement on January 12 in support of the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Hold Seminar
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Hold Seminar
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia held a seminar on the joint New Year editorial of leading papers of the DPRK on January 14.
					 Speeches were made there by Sok Song, first vice-chairman of the confederation, and others.
					
					 The speakers noted that last year was a year of dramatic change to be specially recorded in the history of the country, a year which witnessed eye-opening events that turned all the ideals of the people into reality.
					
					 They spoke with high appreciation that General Secretary Kim Jong Il kindled the torch of a great surge in Kangson, birthplace of the Chollima movement, and proposed launching the 150-day campaign and then 100-day campaign before taking revolutionary measures to bring them to victorious conclusions.
					
					 They stressed the need for all the Koreans to hold high the slogan "Let the entire nation unite under the banner of north-south joint declarations and achieve national reunification at the earliest date!" and step up the grand nationwide march toward reunification while meeting all challenges of the anti-reunification forces this year which marks the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, an event of great significance in accomplishing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the people in the homeland would successfully implement the tasks set forth in the joint editorial as long as there is the tested leadership of Kim Jong Il, they said that overseas compatriots, too, would devote their all to building a great, prosperous and powerful nation and reunifying the country.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- One day in April Juche 66 (1977) President Kim Il Sung visited then Yonphung Senior Middle School in Anju County.
					 Pleased to look at students in new school uniforms, he suggested taking pictures of them one by one and keeping their reshot pictures for himself.
					
					 The students were very happy.
					
					 Photographing for hours he suddenly pulled the camera down from his eyes. Saying he couldn't see well, he looked at the blue sky over the mountain behind the school for a while.
					
					 He then held the camera in his hands again and took photos of all the students and even teachers.
					
					 On his way back, he, with a broad smile on his face, told officials that he was really happy for having been with schoolchildren that day.
					
					 Indeed he was the tender-hearted leader who had found his happiness in doing something for children.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il ve ejercicio conjunto de fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il ve ejercicio conjunto de fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, vio los ejercicios conjuntos de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas del EPC.
					Tras recibir el parte de recepcion, el Comandante Supremo subio al mirador donde escucho explicaciones sobre el plan del entrenamiento y lo presencio.
					
					   Al darse la orden del inicio de los ejercicios, las escuadrillas de aviones, los buques y los canones terrestres de diversos generos, mediante la cooperacion estrecha, lanzaron una lluvia de despiadados fuegos al "colectivo enemigo", por lo cual la "posicion enemiga" se hizo pedazos y se convirtio en un mar de fuegos.
					
					El entrenamiento mostro bien la firme decision y la capacidad de implacable golpe de los militares del ejercito popular rebosados del espiritu combativo de  aniquilar de un solo golpe a los agresores valiendose de las invencibles fuerzas militares consolidadas si estos invaden una pulgada de la sagrada tierra patria y de defender de modo inexpugnable a la patria socialista 
					
					Al ver los valientes ejercicios de los soldados listos para combatir uno contra cien enemigos y armados  con los metodos de combate jucheanos, el Comandante Supremo se mostro muy satisfecho de que todos los uniformados hayan estado firmemente dispuestos en lo politico e ideologico y en lo militar y tecnico para frustrar a tiempo cualquier invasion inesperada de los enemigos y salvaguardar como muralla de acero a la patria socialista.
					
					 Evaluo altamente sus exitos alcanzados en el entrenamiento y presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia para fortalecer el EPC como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					Subrayo que el heroico EPC crecio como un peloton suicida capaz de luchar lanzandose como bomba y los combatientes vanguardistas de la revolucion del Songun quienes dedican sin vacilacion su juventud y vida para el partido y el lider, la patria y el pueblo, y se desarrollo como poderosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias dispuestas de los modernos medios ofensivos y defensivos.
					
					Agrego que gracias a contar con las filas selectas de acero, gran ejercito invencible, consolidado en el  fragor de larga y ardua lucha, nuestra patria socialista es una fortaleza inexpugnable y nuestra causa revolucionaria sale siempre victoriosa.
					
					Y expreso esperanza y conviccion de que los oficiales y los soldados del EPC defenderan fidedignamente con las armas la seguridad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Le acompanaron los vicepresidentes del CDN de la RPDC Ri Yong Mu y O Kuk Ryol, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, los secretarios del CC del PTC Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.
					
					Ademas, los vieron los comandantes de varias unidades, los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la rama de industria de defensa nacional, asi como los funcionarios directivos de la sociedad.

articles.title: MINREX califica de racional la iniciativa sobre el convenio de paz
articles.content:
MINREX califica de racional la iniciativa sobre el convenio de paz
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 18 una declaracion subrayando que nuestra iniciativa de firmar el convenio de paz es el remedio racional para implementar general y totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre.
					  Para poner en practica esa declaracion conjunta, no debe ser desvirtuado el espiritu de respeto mutuo y de igualdad, que resulta lo vital de ella, ni tergiversado el orden de acciones, adelanta la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Esa declaracion conjunta establece que se debe resolver de manera "proporcionada" los problemas tales como la desnuclearizacion, la normalizacion de las relaciones, la remuneracion energetica y el establecimiento del sistema de paz. En ella no se ve un articulo de consenso que estipule que sera posible discutir el problema de establecer el sistema de paz cuando haya avances en la desnuclearizacion. El principio de "promesa vs. promesa" y "accion vs. accion" esta anotado como el unico principio de ejecucion de esa Declaracion Conjunta. 
					
					  Tomando en consideracion la situacion de la parte estadounidense, hemos realizado durante mas de 6 anos el indulgente esfuerzo de anteponer el debate de la desnuclearizacion a la discusion sobre la concertacion del convenio de paz en las conversaciones a 6 bandas. En el ano 2008, la sociedad internacional ha sido testigo presencial de la voladura de la torre de enfriamiento de las instalaciones nucleares de Nyongbyon. El proceso de desnuclearizacion habia logrado un avance tan sustancial como que EE.UU. dejo de aplicar a nuestro pais la ley de comercio con paises hostiles y lo elimino de la "lista de los paises que apoyan el terrorismo".
					
					  Sin embargo, no se pudo iniciar siquiera el debate sobre la firma del convenio de paz y por consiguiente, el proceso de desnuclearizacion tomo el rumbo inverso. Es decir, resulto fracasado el metodo de impulsar la desnuclearizacion antes de debatir sobre el sistema de paz.
					
					  La experiencia practica mostro que dar impulso a la desnuclearizacion sin la confianza significa construir una casa sin sentar su base. 
					
					  No rechazamos las conversaciones a 6 bandas ni tenemos el motivo de dilatarlas. 
					
					  Por la falta de la confianza entre los paises participantes, ocurrio el incidente de cuestionar hasta el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos.

articles.title: Megawati Soekarnoputri se refiere a relaciones con el PTC
articles.content:
Megawati Soekarnoputri se refiere a relaciones con el PTC
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ATCC) -- La presidenta del Consejo de Direccion Central del Partido Democratico de Lucha de Indonesia, Megawati Soekarnoputri, se reunio el dia 13 con el embajador coreano acreditado en su pais.
					En la ocasion la presidenta deseo que bajo la orientacion del Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC), el gobierno y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea lograran mayores exitos en la lucha por construir una potencia economica y reunificar la patria en acato al editorial conjunto de los periodicos principales de Corea publicado con motivo del Ano Nuevo.
					
					Ella asintio dicho editorial conjunto que aclara la voluntad de la RPDC de abrir el camino para mejorar las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea en este ano del decimo aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y de esforzarse por preparar el sistema de la paz duradera y realizar la desnuclearizacion en la Peninsula Coreana, y deseo sinceramente que Corea sea reunificada cuanto antes.
					
					Subrayo que el Partido Democratico de Lucha de Indonesia apoya siempre la lucha del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Corea por la reunificacion del pais, la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y hara ingentes esfuerzos por continuar desarrollando las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con el PTC.

articles.title: Entidades mexicanas apoyan declaracion de MINREX de Corea
articles.content:
Entidades mexicanas apoyan declaracion de MINREX de Corea
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ATCC) -- En apoyo a la declaracion del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Partido Socialista del Pueblo, el Comite Mexicano de Estudio del Kimilsunismo y otros partidos politicos y entidades de Mexico hicieron publica el dia 13 una  declaracion conjunta.
					El documento subraya que la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana es la meta politica que viene manteniendo invariablemente el gobierno de la RPDC para contribuir a la paz y la seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico y a la desnuclearizacion del Mundo.
					
					   La RPDC propuso cortesmente a los paises responsables del Acuerdo de Armisticio iniciar inmediatamente el dialogo para sustituir este documento por el convenio de paz en este ano del aniversario 60 del estallido de la guerra coreana,  senala la nota y anade que lo aplaude calurosamente como importante medida promotora y constructiva y lo apoya enteramente.
					
					   Exhorta a los partidos politicos, gobiernos y entidades de todos los paises del mundo a apoyar y estimular vigorosamente la lucha del Partido del Trabajo, el gobierno y el pueblo de Corea por adornar brillantemente el 2010 como un ano en que se abra una nueva coyuntura para la reintegracion independiente al apresurar la gran marcha pannacional por la reunificacion en el presente ano en que se cumplen el 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC, el 10o de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el 30o de la presentacion del Proyecto de Fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo, enarbolando la consigna de "!Logremos cuanto antes la reunificacion de la Patria, con la unidad de toda la nacion, bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur!"
					
					Por otra parte, el Comite Suiza-Corea publico el dia 12 tambien la declaracion en senal de apoyo a la citada declaracion del MINREX.
